returns.factories: The list of registered factories in the range.

returns.info: The factory info with associated metadata.
The list of factory info with associated metadata.
The instance info with associated metadata.
The list of instance info with associated metadata.

returns.instances: The list of registered instances in the range.

params._data: The data associated with the factories.

params.__factories: The factory associated with the instances.
params._data: The data associated with the instances.

getFactoriesInRange(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets the registered factories in the range of the provided         indices.

getFactoryAtIndex(uint256).notice: Gets the registered factory at an index.

getFactoryInfo(address).notice: Gets the Hyperdrive factory info for a factory.

getFactoryInfoWithMetadata(address).notice: Gets the Hyperdrive factory info with associated metadata for a         factory.

getFactoryInfos(address[]).notice: Gets the Hyperdrive factory info for a list of factories.

getFactoryInfosWithMetadata(address[]).notice: Gets the Hyperdrive factory info with associated metadata for a         list of factories.

getInstanceAtIndex(uint256).notice: Gets the registered instance at an index.

getInstanceInfo(address).notice: Gets the instance info for an instance.

getInstanceInfoWithMetadata(address).notice: Gets the instance info with associated metadata for an instance.

getInstanceInfos(address[]).notice: Gets the instance info for a list of instances.

getInstanceInfosWithMetadata(address[]).notice: Gets the instance info with associated metadata for a list of         instances.

getInstancesInRange(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets the registered instances in the range of the provided         indices.

getNumberOfFactories().notice: Gets the number of Hyperdrive factories that have been registered.

getNumberOfInstances().notice: Gets the number of Hyperdrive instances that have been registered.

setFactoryInfo(address[],uint128[]).notice: Allows the admin to set arbitrary info for Hyperdrive factories.

setInstanceInfo(address[],uint128[],addr.notice: Allows the admin to set arbitrary info for Hyperdrive instances.

updateAdmin(address).notice: Allows admin to transfer the admin role.
